For example, it will get into the grass and cannot move, and simgetcollisioninfo() will not remind me. comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hanlei666-python>@hanlei666-python</denchmark-link> Hi, can you please share the collision settings for the ground in this level? In particular check whether it's set to "Collision Enabled", "GenerateOverlapEvents=true", and that it's set to collide with all collision channels. The collision settings can be found in the details panel of the actor.
